column3: to make something holy; to give official approval to something
seeming evil or dangerous; making you think something bad will happen
a speech in a play in which a character, who is alone on the stage, speaks his or her thoughts
to introduce or spread feelings or ideas, especially ones that cause trouble
sleep; a time when somebody is sleeping
to not be able to fight an attack, a temptation, a disease, etc.
an idea that you think is true although you may not be able to prove it
very likely to be influenced, harmed or affected by something
